head.supplied: Melbourne botan. Garden, ¶ 20/5/70 ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ I have the honor to acknowledge with gratitude the transmission of two copies of N. 5 of Beddomes icones plantarum Indiae orientalis through the hon. the ...

div.p: V70/5428, unit 465, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

I have the honor to acknowledge with gratitude the transmission of two copies of N. 5 of Beddomes icones plantarum Indiae orientalis through the hon. the Chief secretary from the Gov. of Madras,
See W. Odgers to M, 14 May 1870 (in this edition as 70-05-14a). The item was Part 5 of Beddome (1874), of which only a single volume was published, issued in parts from 1868; see TL2. and have deposited these publications in the library of my department. I have sent Major Beddome by this mail the last number of my fragmenta
B70.04.01.
in reciprocity and in continuation of former gifts on behalf of the Victorian Government.

div.p: I have the honor to be,
